title: Rahat Anticipatory Humanitarian Action Project 2024adsasdasd
content:
At Rumsan, we believe technology becomes truly powerful when rooted in empathy and purpose. That’s why we were honored to join the AWS x Deloitte Social Entrepreneur Accelerator in Cape Town—two transformative days of learning, collaboration, and visioning for scalable impact.

From deep dives into cloud and AI to sessions on sustainable innovation and inclusive design, the accelerator emphasized one core message: build with empathy, and solve for real user needs.

Key highlights included:

  • Exploring AWS tools to scale social impact
  • Engaging with mentors from AWS and Deloitte
  • Learning from global entrepreneurs building for underserved communities
  • Embracing a strong “customer-first” mindset in tech development

Thank you to AWS, Deloitte, and the inspiring changemakers we met. We return recharged, with fresh ideas and renewed purpose to scale hope—one human-centered solution at a time.

title: MIT Solve announced Rahat Beema as an official 2023 Solver team
